title: Random
content: What coding languages would be appropriate to learn for placements and good marks in exams

comments.body: Language does not matter, feel free to code in your preferred language

*hi bhai*

  *bhai ye hai a = 10;*

  *bhai ye hai b = "two";*

  *bhai ye hai c = 15;*

  *a = a + 1;*

  *b = 21;*

  *c \*= 2;*

*bye bhai*
When you have *bhai* in your life why do you need brain (or fuck)
